H0.text: Which mediaeval author wrote The Canterbury Tales. Geoffrey of Monmouth

H1.text: Which mediaeval author wrote The Canterbury Tales. John Gower

H2.text: Which mediaeval author wrote The Canterbury Tales. William Langland

H3.text: Which mediaeval author wrote The Canterbury Tales. Chaucer

A4.text: Geoffrey Chaucer ( ; JEF-ree CHAW-sər; c. 1343 – 25 October 1400) was an English poet, writer and civil servant best known for The Canterbury Tales.
